select item.*, nvl(cnt,0) cnt, m.member_name seller_name from item left outer join (select review.review_item_id, count(*) cnt from review group by review_item_id) c on item.item_id = c.review_item_id join member m on item.item_seller = m.member_id where ITEM_CATEGORY = 'treat'

insert into item (ITEM_ID, ITEM_NAME, ITEM_CATEGORY, ITEM_PRICE, ITEM_CONTENT, ITEM_IMAGE_ORIGINAL, ITEM_IMAGE_FILE, ITEM_REG_DATE, ITEM_SEX, ITEM_WEIGHT, ITEM_SPECIES, ITEM_ADDRESS, ITEM_SELLER, MEMBER_ID) values (#{ITEM_ID}, #{ITEM_NAME}, #{ITEM_CATEGORY}, #{ITEM_PRICE}, #{ITEM_CONTENT}, #{ITEM_IMAGE_ORIGINAL}, #{ITEM_IMAGE_FILE}, sysdate, #{ITEM_SEX, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ITEM_WEIGHT, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ITEM_SPECIES, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ITEM_ADDRESS}, #{ITEM_SELLER}, #{MEMBER_ID})
mapper.select: select item.*, nvl(cnt,0) cnt, m.member_name seller_name, m.member_tell seller_tell from item left outer join (select review.review_item_id, count(*) cnt from review group by review_item_id) c on item.item_id = c.review_item_id join member m on item.item_seller = m.member_id where ITEM_ID = #{ITEM_ID}
mapper.insert: insert into ORDERINFO (order_id, order_member_id, order_item_id, order_item_sellerName, order_item_name, order_item_price, order_time, order_location, order_image, order_item_tell, order_member_tell ) values (order_seq.nextval , #{order_member_id}, #{order_item_id}, #{order_item_sellerName}, #{order_item_name}, #{order_item_price}, #{order_time}, #{order_location}, #{order_image}, #{order_item_tell},#{order_member_tell})

insert into wish (WISH_ID, WISH_ITEM_ID, WISH_MEMBER_ID, WISH_ITEM_NAME, WISH_ITEM_IMAGE, WISH_RSV_DATE, WISH_ITEM_PRICE) values (wish_seq.NEXTVAL, #{WISH_ITEM_ID}, #{WISH_MEMBER_ID} , #{WISH_ITEM_NAME}, #{WISH_ITEM_IMAGE}, SYSDATE, #{WISH_ITEM_PRICE})
